```c
// Global variables
#define MAX 50001
int ptable[MAX];

// This function initializes an array `table` to mark non-prime numbers up to MAX.
// It returns 0 upon completion.
int makePrimeTable(int *table)
  // No function calls

// The main function reads a series of integers from standard input until a zero is encountered.
// For each integer `n`, it counts and prints the number of distinct pairs (i, j) such that both `i` and `n-i` are prime.
// The function uses the `ptable` generated by `makePrimeTable` to check for prime numbers.
int main()
  Calls makePrimeTable(...)
```
